attributes.action: SAVE OUR PCSO's IN TILBURY AND SURROUNDING AREAS
attributes.additional_details: WE ARE AT RISK OF LOSING OUR LOCAL PCSO'S, PLEASE SIGN TO CONFIRM YOUR AGREEMENT TO KEEP PCSO'S ON OUR STREETS KEEPING THEM SAFE AND SECURE FOR ALL

rejection.details: The e-petitions process is designed to allow individuals to raise issues about Government policy. The matter that you have raised is an operational one for your local police force.
